hiya everyone: but when i try to connect i get connection refused
ok, i have proftpd setup (im on drapper server) with a guide. its al configured correctly i think, and i started it, but i still can't connect to it
Can't connect to it - using an ftp client or attempting a tcp connection to port 21? ie if you can't get response on telnet, it most likely didn't start for whatever reason
Is it on LAN or is the server connected to the internet?
its a remote server connected to the internet with no firewall

Ok, first things first, ssh to the server and type: telnet localhost 21   - if that gives you "connection refused" immediately, your proftpd is not running. If it connects but no response, you might want to verify that DNS is configured properly
Ok, then type: ps auxww|grep proftp   - see if the process is up and running
Exactly, so its not running. (That process is merely the "grep" you just executed, _not_ the actual server)
So its a configuration problem, then. I don't have proftpd on my boxes so cant test it - but usually you will find some clues by doing: tail -n 20 /var/log/messages
Also check /var/log/ directory and see if it has some specific proftpd logs (ie a directory or file(s) named proftpd*)
